title: Equity in Ultimate Resource Guide
description: A list of useful links, with sections about Gender, LGBTQIA, Race, and Disability/Neuroatypical

title: EUF Trangender Inclusion Policy - Recommended reading list
description: A short overview of the history of trangender athletes in sport, with links to key resources

title: How to play Ultimate - intro video
description: A 2 minute introductory video on how to play Ultimated

title: Ultimate Frisbee Vertical Stack for Beginners
description: Learn how to play with a vertical formation

title: Ultimate Frisbee Horizontal Stack For Beginners
description: Learn how to play with an horizontal formation

title: This is Ultimate
description: A video with footage showing people playing. It does not explain the sport but it is cool.

title: 175 Grams
description: A video on the transformative power of sport in a community. Winner of the Short Film Challenge at the 2015 Sundance Film Festival.

title: The Dump-Swing | RISE UP Ultimate: S1 Ep1 [Full Episode]
description: A training video on how to teach the dump-swing movement

title: Give-Go Moves | RISE UP Ultimate S1 Ep6 [Full Episode]
description: A training video on how to teach the give-go moves

title: Marking (The Triangle Progression) | RISE UP Ultimate S2 Ep1 [Full Episode]
description: A training video on how to teach how to mark in Ultimate

title: WFDF membership application - Frequently Asked Questions
description: Some key information on how to become a WFDF member federation

title: The One Word To Get Ultimate Into Every School
description: Excellent article on how to communicate the values of SOTG to the people who need to hear them
